snippet: The findings were the first formal acknowledgment by Afghan officials of a widespread problem with abuse, after they initially denied the conclusions of a United Nations report.
abstract: Afghan government panel acknowledges widespread torture of detainees after two-week investigation of United Nations report citing rampant abuses.

byline.contributor: Habib Zahori contributed reporting from Kabul, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: The findings were the first formal acknowledgment by Afghan officials of a widespread problem with abuse, after they initially denied the conclusions of a United Nations report.
